marklogic.body: I believe it is interesting to understand how journalist get the information about a company, and if there is any way a public relations practitioner can interact further with them to make information more accessible. It is my belief that twitter is used more for information sharing and dissemination, that is why the journalists find it easier to interact with, unlike Facebook which is considered more of a personal space where you interact with friends. This infographic and report show how organisations blogs are an important Spot for information, this must Always be kept in mind when doing an online pr strategy. Social media news rooms are more and more important and becoming an important addition to the organisations website. The social media news room, is not only for journalists but it also helps the publics to interact and see the information more openly.
